author: @srithar94
text: If we are using lemmatizer with first letter being caps, then desired result is not achieved. So convert all your words to lowercase i guess   For example:  For the word - Importance Lemma is - Importance and corresponding stem is - import For the word - Cats Lemma is - Cats and corresponding stem is - cat For the word - Geese Lemma is - Geese and corresponding stem is - gees For the word - Rocks Lemma is - Rocks and corresponding stem is - rock For the word - Cacti Lemma is - Cacti and corresponding stem is - cacti   For the word - importance Lemma is - importance and corresponding stem is - import For the word - cats Lemma is - cat and corresponding stem is - cat For the word - geese Lemma is - goose and corresponding stem is - gees For the word - rocks Lemma is - rock and corresponding stem is - rock For the word - cacti Lemma is - cactus and corresponding stem is - cacti

author: @antoinefdu
text: "better" is an excellent example to show the differences in interpretation between pos parameters: lemmatizer.lemmatize('better', 'a') ==> 'good' lemmatizer.lemmatize('better', 'v') ==> 'better' lemmatizer.lemmatize('better', 'r') ==>  'well'
